description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Stirling Albion vs Edinburgh City in the Scottish League Two
title: Stirling Albion vs Edinburgh City: Scottish League Two stats & head-to-head
title_page: Stirling Albion vs Edinburgh City: Scottish League Two stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Match ends, Stirling Albion 2, Edinburgh City 1.
Full Time
Second Half ends, Stirling Albion 2, Edinburgh City 1.
Post
Fourth official has announced 4 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt blocked. Malik Zaid (Edinburgh City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Post
Lewis McArthur (Edinburgh City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Post
Ryan Shanley (Stirling Albion) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution
Substitution, Stirling Albion. Euan Deveney replaces Leyton Grant because of an injury.
Post
Dale Carrick (Stirling Albion) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
